data.value: The monster dropped no loot, cheap bastard...

data.name: chooseAction
data.value: Choose an action: 1) Attack 2) Run 3) Player Information 4) Monster Information 5) Exit Application

data.name: corpse
data.value: Beneath the monster's corpose was... {0}! You found an item!

data.name: death
data.value: The monster delivers the final blow, and as you fell to the ground, you wondered what you did wrong. Maybe you were not born a warrior afterall, or maybe attacking {0} was not as wise as you thought...But none of that matters now. You closed your eyes in remorse and entered your enternal slumber...

data.name: defeatmonsters
data.value: You have defeated {0} monsters! (Enter any key to exit)

data.name: g2description
data.value: Uh oh, That's a big gorilla

data.name: i18n2
data.value:
A blinding light shines from the corpse of the monster, devouring its body. A line of words rises to the air, you struggle to read what it says...it says 'Unicode is the future'...?
You discovered {0}!

data.name: i18n3
data.value: A dazzling light shimmers under the monster's limp body, you discovered a legendary item, the {0}!

data.name: item
data.value: You compared the item to the one you had, and discarded it. The one you had was much better.

data.name: potion
data.value: Foolish as you are, you drank the potion in one breath and lost {0} health... Current health: {1}-{0}/{2}

data.name: potion2
data.value: You used it and gained {0} health! Current health: {1}+{0}/{2}

data.name: room
data.value: Let's delve into the massive dungeon known as Morse Hall

data.name: room10
data.value: A pit yawns open before you just on the other side of the door's threshold. The entire floor of the room has fallen into a second room beneath it. Across the way you can spy a door in the wall now 15 feet off the rubble-strewn floor, and near the center of the room stands a thick column of mortared stone that appears to hold the spiral staircase that leads down to what was the lower level.

data.name: room2
data.value: A huge stewpot hangs from a thick iron tripod over a crackling fire in the center of this chamber. A hole in the ceiling allows some of the smoke from the fire to escape, but much of it expands across the ceiling and rolls down to fill the room in a dark fog. Other details are difficult to make out, but some creature must be nearby, because it smells like a good soup is cooking.

data.name: room3
data.value: Rats inside the room shriek when they hear the door open, then they run in all directions from a putrid corpse lying in the center of the floor. As these creatures crowd around the edges of the room, seeking to crawl through a hole in one corner, they fight one another. The stinking corpse in the middle of the room looks human, but the damage both time and the rats have wrought are enough to make determining its race by appearance an extremely difficult task at best.

data.name: room4
data.value: This room is shattered. A huge crevasse shears the chamber in half, and the ground and ceilings are tilted away from it. It's as though the room was gripped in two enormous hands and broken like a loaf of bread. Someone has torn a tall stone door from its hinges somewhere else in the dungeon and used it to bridge the 15-foot gap of the chasm between the two sides of the room. Whatever did that must have possessed tremendous strength because the door is huge, and the enormous hinges look bent and mangled.

data.name: room5
data.value: As soon as you entered the room, a dazzling white light blinds you. Just as you wondered if you finally got out of the dungoen, an eerie sound echoes from the distant, sharpening your mind. When your eyes finally adapted to the light, you looked around in alert and noticed something on the walls. Once you stood closer to it, you realized that the entire wall has the word "death" written all over it in some mysterious red liquid. The unsettling scene gave you goosebumps as you became even more determined about getting out of this place.

data.name: room6
data.value: This small chamber seems divided into three parts. The first has several hooks on the walls from which hang dusty robes. An open curtain separates that space from the next, which has a dry basin set in the floor. Beyond that lies another parted curtain behind which you can see several straw mats in a semicircle pointing toward a statue of a dog-headed man.

data.name: room7
data.value: The burble of water reaches your ears after you open the door to this room. You see the source of the noise in the far wall: a large fountain artfully carved to look like a seashell with the figure of a seacat spewing clear water into its basin.

data.name: room8
data.value: A rusted portcullis stands just beyond the door. Looking into the room, you see three other exits, similarly blocked by portcullises. Four monsters dressed in aged clothing and rusting armor lie on the floor in the room against the walls. They seem in poses of repose rather than violence.

data.name: room9
data.value: A flurry of bats suddenly flaps through the doorway, their screeching barely audible as they careen past your heads. They flap past you into the rooms and halls beyond. The room from which they came seems barren at first glance.

data.name: selectPlayer
data.value: Select your player A) Viking B) Chief C) Deathwing D) Elf E) Caveman F) Orc G) Gnome H) Native I) Goblin J) Localization Professional

data.name: validOption
data.value: As a punishment of not choosing a valid option, you have automatically became a Goblin.
